statements: SELECT * FROM boxing_payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM boxing_payments WHERE event_id = 123;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM boxing_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM boxing_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, payment_amount FROM boxing_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM boxing_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, payment_amount FROM boxing_payments WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT payment_amount, event_name FROM boxing_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxing_payments WHERE event_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND payment_date > '2021-07-01' ORDER BY event_id, payment_date;
SELECT payment_amount, event_name FROM boxing_payments WHERE event_name LIKE 'Floyd%' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxing_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM boxing_events WHERE event_location = 'Las Vegas';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM boxing_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT event_name, transaction_amount FROM boxing_events JOIN transactions ON boxing_events.event_id = transactions.event_id;
SELECT * FROM boxing_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location FROM boxing_events WHERE event_location = 'Las Vegas' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, count(transaction_id) as total_transactions FROM boxing_events JOIN transactions ON boxing_events.event_id = transactions.event_id GROUP BY event_name, event_date;
SELECT event_name, sum(transaction_amount) as total_revenue FROM boxing_events JOIN transactions ON boxing_events.event_id = transactions.event_id GROUP BY event_name;

SELECT event_id, event_name, transaction_amount, payment_method FROM boxing_events JOIN transactions ON boxing_events.event_id = transactions.event_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM boxing_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM boxing_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT payment_date, payment_method FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM boxing_events WHERE event_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM boxing_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM boxing_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT payments.payment_id, transactions.transaction_date, payments.payment_method FROM payments JOIN transactions ON payments.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT event_id, event_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transactions_count FROM boxing_events LEFT JOIN transactions ON boxing_events.event_id = transactions.event_id GROUP BY event_id, event_name;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM boxing_events
SELECT * FROM fighters WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight'
SELECT payment_type, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT fighter_name, country, age FROM fighters WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY country
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM boxing_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM boxing_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT fighter_name, weight_class FROM fighters WHERE country='USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fighters WHERE age > 30;
SELECT fighter_name, amount FROM fighters JOIN transactions ON fighters.fighter_id = transactions.fighter_id;
SELECT * FROM boxing_events;
SELECT event_name, venue, city, country FROM boxing_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, weight_class, nationality FROM boxers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT manager_name, nationality FROM managers WHERE age < 50;
SELECT * FROM boxing_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, venue, city, country FROM boxing_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, age, weight_class FROM boxers WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN boxers ON transactions.boxer_id = boxers.boxer_id WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_method, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
